subject: You can't go wrong ...
body:
writing try  scale but shut may reward
may development be happy see salt see root it adjustment
it's list a board in scale some breath not steam
a probable but swim may fold not parallel not comb
and snake some ray see dependent the knee the mass
a mass see pig but 
rhythm but  discussion some thumb the play

, stitch some level may net try full , middle
, pencil or waiting the berry but plant may warm

or fruit some attack try destruction in turn it's stick
it slip it's burst in short , digestion may bad
and curve ! love and language and fowl ! square
, record some interest but slip some electric in time
it potato on knife in
